title: 054 - Jonnie W -  Insulation, CrossFit and Glowing Pigs
description:
We’re back for our second video episode!! Tim IMMEDIATELY needs to turn the lights down. Jonnie wears aquasocks in public. Caleb dares the gang to eat fiberglass insulation. Freight weighs in on the Angry Birds movie. And the gang talks vehicular salutes.  Also in this episode: Caleb discovers Christian parody t-shirts. Jonnie is afraid of radioactive boars. The gang calls Jean, our event manager, on the phone. Freight gets a can of boiled nuts in his hotel room. Tim walks through a graveyard. And everybody regrets opening the salmon jerky.  Get your Poddy Break Merch! Click Here!!!!
 Follow us @poddybreak Email us at poddybreak@rockshowcomedy.com Click here  to see Tim LIVE!!!
 Get more of Jonnie at http://www.jonniew.com/ Tweet him @jonnie_w

itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: Spirit Wars: The Soul Awakens

content:encoded:
We’re back for our second video episode!! Tim IMMEDIATELY needs to turn the lights down. Jonnie wears aquasocks in public. Caleb dares the gang to eat fiberglass insulation. Freight weighs in on the Angry Birds movie. And the gang talks vehicular salutes.

Also in this episode: Caleb discovers Christian parody t-shirts. Jonnie is afraid of radioactive boars. The gang calls Jean, our event manager, on the phone. Freight gets a can of boiled nuts in his hotel room. Tim walks through a graveyard. And everybody regrets opening the salmon jerky.
